itemDescription: Professor of Materials Theory at ETH Zurich

wikipedia_page.main: Nicola Ann Spaldin (born 1969) FRS is Professor of Materials Theory at ETH Zurich, known for her pioneering research on multiferroics.

response: France 24 documentary "Nicola Spaldin: The pioneer behind multiferroics" (12 minutes) https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bfVKtIcl2Nk&t=10s
ICTP Colloquium "From materials to cosmology; Studying the early universe under the microscope" by Nicola Spaldin (1 hour) https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CYHB0BZQU-U

link_mentions.page: L'Oréal-UNESCO For Women in Science Awards
response: * Nicola Spaldin (Switzerland) "For her groundbreaking multidisciplinary work predicting, describing and creating new materials that have switchable magnetic and ferroelectric properties."
